香華: (こうげ) - flowers and incense (given as a Buddhist offering)
香蒲: (かま) - common cattail (Typha latifolia); common bulrush; common reed mace
香袋: (こうのう) - perfume pouch; metallic scent ball to be hanged inside
香道具: (こうどうぐ) - incense set (e.g. burner, tray, tongs, etc.)
香雨鳥: (コウウチョウ) - brown-headed cowbird (Molothrus ater)
香魚: (アユ) - sweetfish (Plecoglossus altivelis altivelis)/ayu; (ねんぎょ only)   salmon
馨しい: (かんばしい) - sweet/fragrant/aromatic; (esp. neg. for unsavory, etc.) good (e.g. reputation, rumor)/favorable
馬が合う: (うまがあう) - to get on well (with a person); to be a good match with one's horse (e.g. of a rider)
馬に乗る: (うまにのる) - to get on a horse; to mount a horse
馬のほね: (うまのほね) - person of doubtful origin
馬の合う: (うまのあう) - to get along well with
馬の耳に念仏: (うまのみみにねんぶつ) - (proverb)  not heeding what others say; in one ear and out the other; reading the nenbutsu into a horse's ear
馬の足: (うまのあし) - minor or untalented actor (relegated to roles such as the legs of a stage horse)
馬の骨: (うまのほね) - person of doubtful origin
馬は馬連れ: (うまはうまづれ) - Birds of a feather flock together
馬を水辺に導く事は出来るが馬に水を飲ませる事は出来ない: (うまをみずべにみちびくことはできるがうまにみずをのませることはできない) - You may take a horse to the water, but you cannot make him drink
馬丁: (ばてい) - stable boy; stable hand; groom
馬上槍試合: (ばじょうやりじあい) - jousting match; joust; tournament (medieval)
馬下駄: (うまげた) - low geta (once used when cleaning the garden)
馬乗り: (うまのり) - horseback riding; sitting astride/straddling
馬乳酒: (ばにゅうしゅ) - kumis; kumiss; koumiss; fermented mare's milk
馬偏: (うまへん) - kanji "horse" radical at left
馬券: (baken) - bilhete de aposta em corrida de cavalos
馬喰: (ばくろう) - cattle or horse trader; good judge of horses or cattle
馬回り: (うままわり) - a daimyo's (mounted) guards or retainers
馬場の殿: (うまばのおとど) - building for observing horse racing, horseback archery, etc. (sometimes specifically that used by the emperor on the greater palace grounds)
馬場殿: (うまばのおとど) - building for observing horse racing, horseback archery, etc. (sometimes specifically that used by the emperor on the greater palace grounds)
馬大頭: (オニヤンマ) - Siebold's dragonfly (Anotogaster sieboldii); jumbo dragonfly
馬子にも衣装: (まごにもいしょう) - anybody can look good with the right clothes; clothes make the man; fine feathers make fine birds; clothes on a packhorse driver
馬子にも衣裳: (まごにもいしょう) - anybody can look good with the right clothes; clothes make the man; fine feathers make fine birds; clothes on a packhorse driver
馬尾藻: (ホンダワラ) - Sargassum fulvellum (species of edible brown alga)
馬幇: (まばん) - caravan (e.g. of Hui Muslims in China)
馬手: (ばしゅ) - stable boy; stable hand; groom
馬楝: (ばれん) - disk-shaped pad for pressing paper when making a print from a wood block; rubbing pad; baren
馬珂貝: (バカガイ) - Mactra chinensis (species of trough shell)
馬甲: (うまよろい) - horse armor; horse armour
馬番連勝: (ばばんれんしょう) - post (horse racing)
馬着: (ばちゃく) - horse blanket; horse rug
馬稼: (バカ) - fool/idiot; trivial matter/folly/absurdity; foolish/stupid/dull/absurd/ridiculous; Mactra chinensis (species of trough shell)
馬糞紙: (ばふんし) - rough cardboard made from straw; low-grade paper (used as a lining)
馬糞鷹: (まぐそたか) - common kestrel (Falco tinnunculus); common buzzard (Buteo buteo)
馬耳東風: (ばじとうふう) - (yoji) utter indifference; talking to the wall; praying to deaf ears
馬肥: (ウマゴヤシ) - toothed medick (Medicago polymorpha)/hairy medick/bur clover; white clover (Trifolium repens)
馬肥やし: (ウマゴヤシ) - toothed medick (Medicago polymorpha)/hairy medick/bur clover; white clover (Trifolium repens)
馬脚: (ばきゃく) - horse's legs; one's true character
馬脚を表わす: (ばきゃくをあらわす) - to reveal the true nature
馬脚を露す: (ばきゃくをあらわす) - to reveal the true nature
馬脚を露わす: (ばきゃくをあらわす) - to reveal the true nature
馬蛭: (ウマビル) - Whitmania pigra (species of leech)
